org.eclipse.wst.jsdt.chromium.debug.ui.actions

Class TemporarilyFormatSourceAction

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.eclipse.wst.jsdt.chromium.debug.ui.actions.SelectionBasedAction<java.util.List<? extends T>>
      • org.eclipse.wst.jsdt.chromium.debug.ui.actions.TemporarilyFormatSourceAction

  • public class TemporarilyFormatSourceAction
extends SelectionBasedAction<java.util.List<? extends T>>
    An action delegate for "Temporarily format source". It formats downloaded JavaScript source, i.e. a file under virtual project and puts the result into another file under virtual project. It also registers a mapping between these 2 files.

    Additionally the action may work in another mode: "Delete formatted source". This mode gets enabled when user selection contains files created in "Temporarily format source".
